name: European Renal Care Providers Association
goal:
ERCPA is an association founded in early 2014 which represents the interests of the corporate private providers of renal care services, such as dialysis, in the European Union. We partner with policy makers and civil society to discuss, inform and educate on effective and efficient chronic disease management. Our goal is to support patients suffering from Chronic Kidney Disease by ensuring access to safe, effective and personalised care of the highest quality, and by promoting choice in treatment modality.


Vision

A European Union where patients affected by chronic renal disease or related chronic diseases are guaranteed access to safe, effective and personalized care of the highest quality.


Mission Statement

• To partner with policy makers and civil society to discuss, inform and educate on effective and efficient chronic disease management.
• To support effective and efficient EU healthcare legislation on chronic diseases with a particular focus on patients affected by the renal disease.
• To promote transparency of treatment outcomes in order to support continuous improvement of the quality of patient care.
• To increase the focus on prevention and ensure a patient’s right to choose his or her most suitable treatment modality.


Core Values

• Patient Choice
• Care Excellence
• Outcome Transparency
• Sustainable Systems
